tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: The annual IFRS Accounting Taxonomy 2023
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: The IFRS Accounting Taxonomy 2023 reflects the presentation and disclosure requirements of the IFRS Accounting Standards as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board (IASB) at 1 January 2023, the IFRS for SMEs Standard as issued by the IASB in December 2015 and Practice Statement 1 Management Commentary as issued by the IASB in December 2010. The IFRS Accounting Taxonomy also includes elements that reflect common reporting practice by entities that apply IFRS Accounting Standards (common practice). The IFRS Accounting Taxonomy 2023 includes amendments made to the IFRS Accounting Taxonomy 2022 resulting from: Lease Liability in a Sale and Leaseback (Amendments to IFRS 16 Leases), issued by the IASB in September 2022; Non-current Liabilities with Covenants (Amendments to IAS 1 Presentation of Financial Statements), issued by the IASB in October 2022; and General Improvements and Common Practice.

tp:license.name: The IFRS Taxonomy - Terms and Conditions

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full IFRS Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for full IFRS Accounting Standards reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Management Commentary Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for the IFRS Practice Statement Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full IFRS and Management Commentary Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for full IFRS Accounting Standards reporting with the IFRS Practice Statement Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: IFRS for SMEs Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for IFRS for SMEs Standard reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Combined Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for full IFRS Accounting Standards, IFRS for SMEs Standard and the IFRS Practice Statement Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Basic Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for full IFRS Accounting Standards reporting. Documentation labels are included, but generic links are excluded.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Deprecated Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the deprecated IFRS Accounting Taxonomy elements for IFRS Accounting Standards reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full IFRS Essential Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This Entry Point is provided as a base from which regulators or preparers can build extensions to IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for full IFRS Accounting Standards reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Management Commentary Essential Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This Entry Point is provided as a base from which regulators or preparers can build extensions to IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for the IFRS Practice Statement Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full IFRS and Management Commentary Essential Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This Entry Point is provided as a base from which regulators or preparers can build extensions to IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for full IFRS Accounting Standards reporting with the IFRS Practice Statement Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: IFRS for SMEs Essential Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This Entry Point is provided as a base from which regulators or preparers can build extensions to IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for IFRS for SMEs Standard reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Combined Essential Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This Entry Point is provided as a base from which regulators or preparers can build extensions to IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for full IFRS Accounting Standards, IFRS for SMEs Standard and the IFRS Practice Statement Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Basic Essential Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This Entry Point is provided as a base from which regulators or preparers can build extensions to IFRS Accounting Taxonomy for full IFRS Accounting Standards reporting. Documentation labels are included, but generic links are excluded.
